version_description: [x] Bugfix: iCloud Query - be more conservative about directories & hidden files filtering

[x] Attachments Indicator Icon in Browse View
[x] Local Safes eligible for Auto Fill via Cache
[x] Bugfix: Do not add iCloud directories as Safes
[x] Bugfix: Editing custom fields should not affect core record fields
[x] Show/Hide Password Ref
[x] Bugfix: iCloud Query - be more conservative about directories & hidden files filtering

[x] TOTP - Two Factor Authentication Codes
[x] Allow use of Biometric *AND* PIN Codes to protect Databases
[x] Remove App Level Lock due to numerous side effects and bug reports
[x] Less intrusive privacy screen

[x] BugFix: Browse Safe Scene - Do not autorefresh OTP Tokens in Edit Mode
[x] Security Enhancement - Disable Convenience Open if one of two methods is unavailable

[x] Full Auto Fill support for "Files" based databases
[x] Minor tweaks
[x] BugFix: Possible stack overflow during cell height resize in Item Details

[x] Rolling Backups (Slide Left on Database -> Backups)
[x] Further iOS 13 Fixes
[x] Russian Localization

[x] QuickType AutoFill bugfixes and improvements
[x] Fix missing toolbar in Create New Database sequence

[x] Move View Preferences into Views for better context and cleaner general preferences
[x] Add Twitter Link in Preferences
[x] BugFix Import/Copy To
[x] BugFix: Master Detail Splitter View - Master update on Pop View Controller

[x] Browse View: View As (Hierarchy, List, TOTP List)
[x] Key File Importation Improvements
- Allow use of Key Files in Auto-Fill Context
- Optionally allows users to protect from iOS Files / iTunes File Sharing access
[x] Grou

[x] Improved Password Generation for both Basic and Diceware (XKCD) methods
- Select from Diceware Wordlists in different languages:
- Catalan, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, Swedish
  - English:

[x] WebDAV bugfixes

[x] TOTP Read Only Mode
[x] Incorrect PIN 3 Times disables Con

[x] Entry History Support (View, Restore, Delete, Trim)

[x] Improve Generated XML

[x] Ask on import to Update existing database or create a new one if filenames match
